title: [Large-Scale] Digital Game-Based Self-Regulated Vocabulary Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills at or above the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Conducted on a game-based learning platform utilizing mobile devices, with 20-minute modular learning sessions 3-4 times per week tailored to individual learners' schedules.

learning_goals: Learners autonomously acquire over 50 specialized vocabulary items per week using an in-game feedback system.
Learners maintain learning persistence at over 80% by utilizing game elements (quests, rewards, etc.) based on the ARCS model.
Learners improve vocabulary memorization accuracy from 75% to 90% by applying self-regulated learning strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
